thread.title: 2 of the best vacuums anyone can get for under $100
thread.title_full: 2 of the best vacuums anyone can get for under $100 - Business Insider

author: Tyler Lauletta
title: 2 of the best vacuums anyone can get for under $100
text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff that we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
Amazon
If you’re looking to spring clean your home this season, it’s a good idea to invest in a quality vacuum if you don't already own one.
How do you go about choosing one, though? Well, different vacuums are designed for different needs. We have guides to the best overall vacuums , best handheld vacuums , best cordless vacuums , and best vacuums under $300 . But if you're looking for a couple quick and easy options, Amazon has you covered.
Here, you’ll find the two most popular vacuums on Amazon based on customer reviews and ratings — a full-size standing vacuum and a handheld one. Have a look:
If you want a full-size standing vacuum: Bissell Bissell's model is by far the most popular standing vacuum on Amazon. It has a 4.3/5 star rating after being reviewed nearly 9,000 times, which is impressive.
The positive reviews cite the vacuum’s versatility and ease of use. It allows you to reach tighter spaces with its included Turbobrush attachment, and its internal dirt bin is easy to clear out without making a mess. At $90, it’s reasonably priced given how much use you're likely to get out of it.
BISSELL 9595A Vacuum with OnePass, $89.99 If you want a smaller handheld vacuum: Black + Decker For anyone living in smaller space, it may make more sense to buy a handheld vacuum. It's the perfect tool for quickly cleaning up accidental messes and giving your sofa a little touch-up.
Most reviewers on Amazon liked this model by Black + Decker, highlighting its lithium ion battery, which keeps a charge for an impressive amount of time.
A handheld vacuum is a simple addition to your closet that could make your apartment a whole lot cleaner.
Black + Decker CHV1410L 16V Cordless Lithium Hand Vac, $58.09 Disclosure: This post is brought to you by Business Insider's Insider Picks team. We aim to highlight products and services you might find interesting, and if you buy them, we get a small share of the revenue from the sale from our commerce partners, including Amazon. Jeff Bezos, CEO of Amazon, is an investor in Business Insider through his personal investment company Bezos Expeditions. We frequently receive products free of charge from manufacturers to test. This does not drive our decision as to whether or not a product is featured or recommended. We operate independently from our advertising sales team. We welcome your feedback.
